title: A New Type of Play!?
detail_text: <:th_ch0008/>Uwaah, it’s so cold outside~! I wish I had worn thicker clothes....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>My, then would you like to use Mari’s stole? Here, take it<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Then you would be cold, right, Mari-san? I’ll be fine!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Fufu, don’t underestimate the cold resistance of Aqours who trained on the beach while the sea breeze was blowing in the winter! It’s okay♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Thank you, Mari-san.... Fwaaah, it smells nice~~. *sniff* *sniff*, what is this smell?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>What? Maybe it’s my hair oil?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>It’s a somewhat sweet and pleasant fragrance~.... Waah!? W-, what is it, Mari-san!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Hnn, you smell nice too, Hanayo! It’s the smell of your soap, right!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Eeeh, it’s somewhat embarrassing~....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>It’s nothing to be embarrassed about. Look, if we get close like this, the scent might mix and turn into an even nicer one. Plus, it’s warm, this is a new form of Oshikura Manjuu~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
